name: FORGE (itch)
description:
Made for the GGJ 2020

You're a cyberpunk blacksmith, and you need to repair a LOT of weapons, to do that, you need to press buttons following a specific pattern. Each weapon repaired gives you points, at the end, you can see your score

Installation guide : 

1 - Download the zip file

2 - Unzip it

3 - Launch Forge.exe and have fun !

Controls :

A,B,X,Y on the controller
